entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 37 with temperature rising to minus 31 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear in the evening and after midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 37 with temperature rising to minus 31 by morning. Wind chill minus 48 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
